Subskills.name: Undead Coven
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of skeleton mages.

Subskills.name: Unholy Force
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by skeleton mages.

Subskills.name: Cursed Blast
Subskills.description: Unleash an arcane nova on hit dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Reflection
Subskills.description: Chance for skeleton mages to fire an additional projectile on attack.

Subskills.name: Unholy Spellsling
Subskills.description: Chance for skeleton mages to critically hit.

Subskills.name: Unholy Necrosis
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt by skeleton mages.

Subskills.name: Dark Bolts
Subskills.description: Skeleton mage now fires multiple projectiles in an arc.

Subskills.name: Necrotic Mirage
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to create an illusion for a short period of time.

Subskills.name: Unholy Lightning
Subskills.description: Skeleton mages now shoot a surge of dark lightning with increased range and damage.

Subskills.name: Festering Scorch
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Gluttony
Subskills.description: Increases the life of skeleton mages.

Subskills.name: Unholy Grasp
Subskills.description: Increases attack speed for skeleton mages.

Subskills.name: Chaining Scorn
Subskills.description: Attacks now chain on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Summon Archmage
Subskills.description: You can now only summon one skeleton mage but it scales according to the maximum amount of skeleton mages.
